examples: I couldn't go out because it was raining.
He missed the train because he overslept.
I'm happy because I passed my exam.
Eu não pude sair porque estava chovendo.
Ele perdeu o trem porque dormiu demais.
Estou feliz porque passei no meu exame.

suggested: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems, and not enough examples to show how to solve them!
Because sometimes things just don't work out, and it's not because of anything you did wrong.
Because I said so, that's why!
Because life is unpredictable, and sometimes the things that don't make sense end up being the best things that ever happened to you.
The smell of fresh coffee in the morning, because it's the only thing that gets me out of bed.
The feeling of warm sand between your toes, because it reminds you that there's a whole world out there waiting to be explored.
Because when you find someone who loves you for who you are, everything else just falls into place.
